name: UFGColorInterface
comment:
For blueprint support of the interface, we will never add anything to it, just use it to
have a UCLASS to be able to access

methods.name: SetColorSlot
methods.comment: Sets the color slot for the buildable

methods.name: GetPrimaryColor
methods.comment: Returns the primary color of this building

methods.name: GetSecondaryColor
methods.comment: Returns the primary color of this building

methods.name: GetColorSlot
methods.comment: Returns the color slot index of this building

methods.name: GetCanBeColored
methods.comment: Returns wherther the building can be colored right now or not

methods.name: StartIsAimedAtForColor
methods.comment: Called on by the interface if we are looking at something that's useable

methods.name: StopIsAimedAtForColor
methods.comment: Called when we stop looking at the item
